availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Son of William Bloyd and Rebecca Bloyd. Married to Luciann Mears Bloyd in Green County, Kentucky, on January 10, 1861. Father of William T. Bloyd and Elizabeth M. Bloyd. Resident of Green County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned one enslaved person in 1850. Farmer in Green County.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 2, p. 135B.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 2, p. 224.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, Lower Bush Precinct, p. 490A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Green County, KY, p. 61.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Green County Marriages, Film 000594379.
